page.title: 02Parish Council Droxford
page.content: The long awaited continuous footpath through the village is now near completion.Following another accident at Merrington's crossroads,a 20 ton lorry ended up in the P.C.Chairman's peony bed.Felling of old,beautiful, but sadly unsafe trees in the Beech walk was the centre of much controversy.Grants have been obtained for tree planting in the Recreation ground .The Square suffers from over use particularly at weekends;schemes being investigated to restrict parking The old station has been bought for conversion into a home,causing problems with access to old railway line now designated a public bridleway.Moles continue to make occasional unwanted appearances in the cemetery.{Council}meets 1st Thursday each month in Magistrates Court.New plastic wheelie bins emptied Tuesdays
